title: White Paper: The State of Social Media Research APIs & Tool in the DSA Era
snippet: Fabio Giglietto co-authored a white paper with Massimo Terenzi from the University of Urbino Carlo Bo, which explores how the Digital Services Act (DSA) is transforming data access for platform research. The white paper is part of the PROMPT project.
description: A white paper co-authored by Fabio Giglietto from the University of Urbino Carlo Bo explores the impact of the Digital Services Act (DSA) on data access for social media research, focusing on platform research within the PROMPT project.

title: WHO IS BEHIND VERA.AI? Meet: Team of University of Urbino Carlo Bo
snippet: Fabio Giglietto leads the Uniurb team for the vera.ai project. The team coordinates Work Package 4 (WP4) within the vera.ai project, aiming to discover potentially problematic content in near-real-time using a content-agnostic approach.
description: This news article on veraai.eu introduces the team behind the vera.ai project at the University of Urbino Carlo Bo, specifically mentioning Fabio Giglietto's role in leading the team and coordinating Work Package 4 (WP4) focused on detecting problematic content.

title: Il movimento religioso cinese che si è infiltrato in un gruppo Facebook urbinate - il Ducato
Who is behind vera.ai? Meet the people and teams that make up the vera.ai project. #8 Team of University of Urbino Carlo Bo
snippet: Fabio Giglietto leads the Uniurb team within the vera.ai project, focusing on detecting potentially problematic content in near-real-time by addressing coordinated sharing behavior using social media analysis and network science methods.
description: This web mention highlights Fabio Giglietto's leadership of the Uniurb team within the vera.ai project, focusing on detecting problematic content through social media analysis and network science, showing a direct link to his expertise in social media analysis and disinformation detection.
